resources.string: The coupon will be associated with your Google account. Once you redeem the coupon, you will be able to unlock the features on every device with the same account.
Select the account that will be associated with the coupon.
You need to be logged in with a Google account to redeem a coupon.
Coupon successfully redeemed. Premium features unlocked.
Account successfully verified. Premium features unlocked.
No coupon was found for any of the accounts.
